org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

Class TestReplicationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.TestReplicationBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestNamespaceReplication, TestReplicationAdminWithClusters, TestReplicationChangingPeerRegionservers, TestReplicationDisableInactivePeer, TestReplicationDroppedTables, TestReplicationEmptyWALRecovery, TestReplicationEndpoint, TestReplicationKillRS, TestReplicationSmallTests, TestReplicationStatus, TestReplicationSyncUpTool, TestVerifyReplication

    public class TestReplicationBase
extends Object
    This class is only a base for other integration-level replication tests. Do not add tests here. TestReplicationSmallTests is where tests that don't require bring machines up/down should go All other tests should have their own classes and extend this one
